name: gcp_management
description: Manages Google Cloud Storage buckets and Firestore databases. Can create, delete, and list resources with custom configurations.
author: Ngoga Alexis
capabilities: Creates and deletes GCP storage buckets with optional versioning
Lists all storage buckets in the project
Supports both default and named Firestore databases

tools.name: create_storage_bucket
tools.description: Creates a storage bucket with specified location, class, and versioning options.

tools.name: delete_storage_bucket
tools.description: Deletes a storage bucket, optionally removing all contents first.

tools.name: list_storage_buckets
tools.description: Lists all storage buckets in the project.

tools.name: create_firestore_database
tools.description: Creates a Firestore database (default or named).

tools.name: delete_firestore_database
tools.description: Deletes a Firestore database or clears data from the default database.

tools.name: list_firestore_databases
tools.description: Lists collections and documents in a given Firestore database.

tools.name: list_all_firestore_databases
tools.description: Lists all Firestore databases within the project.

input_schema.prompt: string (required) — Natural language instruction for resource operations. Example: 'Create a storage bucket in us-central1 with versioning enabled.'

output_schema.message: string — Description of the result or any error that occurred.
output_schema.resource_type: string — Type of resource affected, e.g. 'storage_bucket' or 'firestore_database'
output_schema.details: object — Metadata about the resource created, deleted, or listed (optional)
output_schema.error_message: string — Only present if status is 'error'
